title: ELO BOOSTING
body:
To put it in short of boosting, you are passed a accomplishment you didn't enjoy,  learn, control, then gets beaten up by the players at the level you've boosted, learns nothing because there is too much going on at higher level's pace, such like go drive a semi-truck without knowing how to drive a stick.

It's been years since the game's player number booming, why hasn't RIOT do anything about boosting service?

To people who already have and experienced the accomplishment as doing one thing and reach high skill level, it's just pain to watch, when people trying to seek ideal result while putting no effort into it and the authority that allows it, in this case, RIOT and ELO Boosting.

Imagine a world when people buys doctor's permit, 5 star restaurant/service certificate, transportation operator's permit, then causing problems while they know less in such area, while the authority ALLOWS it to happen.

For example, seeing low diamond players, put no wards down, not freezing lane, pushing wave with autos, over extend, gets ganked, complains about opponent zoning him out of froze lane, went out again as lv7 assasin vs lv10 fighter. Team fights, wrong positioning, tunnel vision, 3v5 engage 4v5 engage.
Obvious of low silver knowledge and skill level, just 1 of them can bring other 4 honest player to certain lose, and 5 other player to won the game but not challenged, basically changes nothing but only one factor, ALL player's total number of games to reach their MMR.
  
knowing there is not much way to determine a player is boosting or not unless they admit it, RIOT should focus resource on pinning down the boosting service, need to spend lots time and resource pursuing well hidden web domain and boosters using vpn claiming its safe from RIOT's banning but, this is the one and only thing individual or even a community of players can not do, because we do not own the game, we can not file complains to those website's service provider, as to the responsibility to maintain the match making balance is this game's owner, RIOT.
